WRITING.TEXT: I just became 16 and already have plans for moving out next summer. But this is because I want to, not because I have to. My parents wouldn't have a single problem with me staying at home longer.

They didn't legalise anything. Decriminalise is what they did. If you're caught trafficking drugs of any kind, you will get prosecuted. I'm not sure about overall usage, but what definitely went down are drug-related infections and deaths, especially when it comes to Heroin.
They're both pretty lax on weed...
Knowing that I'll regret it if I don't. That, and simply saying "fuck it".
Same chances, but not same results
